text: The IOException "New frame received after a close control frame" is raised after pressing Disconnect. The exception can be detected by adding an onError method to EchoEndpoint.

Thanks for the report. The close logic wasn't quite right and behaved as if more data was present on the wire when it wasn't.

This has been fixed in trunk.
